keyTyped

public void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
Handle key actions for the Text Frame, if we want to. Currently, all we care about is VK_ENTER. Currently, not used. There's not an easy way to "get current line" in java.awt.TextArea.
Specified by:
